content: **knitted jumper for men in drops snow piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with raglan and high collar size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #wintersprinklessweater drops design pattern ee-795 yarn group e or c + c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 750-850-900-1000-1100-1200 g colour 123 cocoa bits **needles** drops circular needle size 9 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 9 mm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 10 stitches in width and 13 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 9 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
